fields.name: Elixir of Sorcery
fields.description: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes. Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
